casebody.data:
TEAGUE
v.
DOT. No. 281P-06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. Tina Krasner, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of December 2006 by Plaintiff for Writ of Supersedeas:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of January 2007."
